message.body: Hey.. I need major help preparing for the party! We haven't started anything. We have her niece for 2 weeks and I have a cake due tonight and im still training for the police academy. Exam is sat morning.
Are you available tomorrow night and/or sat afternoon?
I'm not sure about tomorrow night because we're supposed to be going to Sam's to meet her boyfriend but I should be good Saturday

Ok that works bec ill be preping fri night. Idk what time sat tho bec idk how long the exam will be. That's what's going to hurt us. Bec Steph will be at work. We still need food/drinks and decorations. This was the week from hell
Okay I'll help. I can get stuff for you too
That would be great. I can make a list and give you my debit card.
